updated 10:56 a.m.EDT, Tue May 10, 2011

Microsoft to buy Skype

The $8.5 billion deal with the real-time video and voice service provider is the largest in Microsoft's history, CNNMoney reports. FULL STORY

Mississippi cresting in soggy Memphis

Residents of flooded Memphis could be dealing with high water levels into June. The Mississippi River's crest will next target Louisiana and Mississippi. FULL STORY | THE 1927 FLOOD | LONG-TERM IMPACT | HI-RES PHOTOS
